rows.stacking_rules: Requires Agility; upgrades the save bonus to +3.
rows.notes: As agility but grants +3 resistance on Reflex saves.

rows.stacking_rules: Requires Improved Agility; upgrades the save bonus to +5.
rows.notes: As agility but grants +5 resistance on Reflex saves.

rows.stacking_rules: Adds +1 effective bonus; total with base is +2; grants +10 vs bull rush/overrun/trip.
rows.notes: As anchoring but +10 enhancement vs bull rush/overrun/trip.

rows.stacking_rules: Adds +1 effective bonus; duration becomes 10 minutes; activation unlimited/day.
rows.notes: As blurring but 10-minute duration and unlimited activations per day.

rows.stacking_rules: Requires Balance; upgrades competence bonus on Balance checks to +10.
rows.notes: As balance, but +10 competence bonus on Balance checks.

rows.stacking_rules: Requires Improved Balance; upgrades competence bonus on Balance checks to +15.
rows.notes: As balance, but +15 competence bonus on Balance checks.

Greater Stamina: +5 resistance bonus on Fortitude saves.

Functions as Corrosive; on crit deals extra acid (x2:1d10; x3:2d10; x4:3d10). Continuous, even if Corrosive not currently active. Projectile weapons pass to ammo.

On crit deals extra damage (x2:1d8; x3:2d8; x4:3d8); doubled vs plants and water-subtype elementals; also fatigues target for 8 hours (or until it drinks ~1 gallon). Continuous; projectile weapons pass to ammo.
As Dislocator but teleports struck target up to 30 ft (Will DC 20 negates). Inherits base usage limit (3/day). Projectile weapons pass to ammo.
On hit may trigger targeted greater dispel magic (3/day).
Melee only. Swift command on a hit to add +3d6 acid; uses/day = 1 + Con mod. Prereq need not be active; one activation per day per wielder; a weapon can have multiple surge types (one per prereq).
Melee only. Swift command on a hit to add +3d6 fire; uses/day = 1 + Con mod. Prereq need not be active; one activation per day per wielder; a weapon can have multiple surge types (one per prereq).
Melee only. Swift command on a hit to add +3d6 cold; uses/day = 1 + Con mod. Prereq need not be active; one activation per day per wielder; a weapon can have multiple surge types (one per prereq).

Melee only. Swift command on a hit to add +3d6 electricity; uses/day = 1 + Con mod. Prereq need not be active; one activation per day per wielder; a weapon can have multiple surge types (one per prereq).
Acts as Bane vs designated type/subtype; on crit deals extra (x2:1d10; x3:2d10; x4:3d10). Glows within 60 ft of designated foe; hums on hits.

rows.stacking_rules: Requires Ghost Touch; adds +1 effective bonus.
rows.notes: Functions as Ghost Touch; sneak attacks and critical hits affect undead as if living.
Melee only. Functions as Holy; on a hit may emit a holy burst vs evil (+3d6). Uses/day = 1 + Cha mod; wasted vs non-evil; one activation per day per wielder.

rows.stacking_rules: Requires Illusion Bane; adds +2 effective bonus.
rows.notes: As Illusion Bane; first illusion dispelled is stored (like spell storing but illusions only, any level, not cast-into, and can be discharged without a hit). Stored spell’s duration is frozen until activation; must dispel another illusion to recharge.

rows.stacking_rules: Requires Ghost Touch; adds +1 effective bonus.
rows.notes: Functions as Ghost Touch; when it damages an incorporeal creature, that target loses its 50% incorporeal miss chance and 50% chance to ignore spells for 1 round (retains other incorporeal benefits).

Functions as Profane; on crit deals extra negative energy (x2:1d10; x3:2d10; x4:3d10), or double vs good outsiders (2d10/4d10/6d10). Burst is continuous and applies even if Profane isn't currently active. Non-undead wielders take 1d4 Con damage (or Cha if no Con). Projectile weapons pass to ammo.

Functions as Psychokinetic; on crit deals extra force (x2:1d6; x3:2d6; x4:3d6). Extra damage is not reduced by DR and affects incorporeal targets even through miss chance. Continuous; applies even if Psychokinetic isn't currently active. Projectile weapons pass to ammo.

Functions as Sacred; on crit deals extra positive energy (x2:1d10; x3:2d10; x4:3d10), or double vs evil outsiders (2d10/4d10/6d10). Continuous and applies even if Sacred isn't currently active. If wielder is undead, burst deals 1d4 Cha damage to the wielder. Projectile weapons pass to ammo.
Functions as Screaming; on crit deals extra sonic (x2:1d8; x3:2d8; x4:3d8). Continuous and applies even if Screaming isn't currently active. Projectile weapons pass to ammo.
Functions as Soulbound; increases essentia capacity to 4 (from 2) and allows enhancement bonus from essentia up to +5 (from +3).
Functions as Enervating; negative levels from hits do not fade in 1 hour—after 24 hours each requires a DC 18 Fort save or becomes actual level loss.
Functions as Enervating; on a critical hit vs a living creature you gain 5 temp HP and +2 morale to melee damage rolls for 10 minutes (temp HP don’t stack).
Functions as Screaming; on a critical hit the target must succeed on DC 17 Fort save or be stunned for 1 round. Projectile weapons pass to ammo.
Functions as Unholy; on a successful melee hit you may (swift) emit an unholy burst dealing +3d6 damage to a good-aligned target. Usable 1 + Cha bonus times/day; wasted on non-good targets.
